```{r}
#some random data
x <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
t <- c(1, 3, 2, 4)

#lm with weights
a1 <- c(1, 1, 1, 1)
model1 <- lm(t ~ x, weights = a1)
plot(x, t, xlim = c(0, 5), ylim = c(0, 5), asp = 1)
abline(model1)
print(model1$coefficients)

```
